body.directions: Please read the phrases in Chinese, and then answer the question that follows.

body.content: 我的眼睛是...的 Wǒde yǎnjīng shì...de.

body.quiz: Which of the following words would complete this sentence?
body.answer: Audio for 褐色 hèsè
options: Audio for 朋友 péngyǒu
Audio for 下午好 xiàwǔhǎo
Audio for 男孩 nánhái
body.correct: Job well done! “我的眼睛是...的。 Wǒde yǎnjīng shì...de” is used to describe one’s eyes; therefore, the word 褐色 hèsè (brown) is most suitable to complete the sentence.
body.incorrect: Very close. Please consider what this sentence is describing.

body.quiz: Which of the following has the color indicated by the word presented?
body.correct: You got it! 绿色 lǜsè is “green,” and it’s the color of healthy grass! Feel free to walk barefoot!
body.incorrect: Not quite. Please use the pinyin part as reference and consider what color it is.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can this word complete?
body.answer: 我的眼睛是...的。 Wǒde yǎnjīng shì ...de.
options: 我的电话号码是… Wǒde diànhuà hàomǎ shì…
body.correct: You got it! 黑色 hēisè means “black,” and it can fit “我的眼睛是...的。 Wǒde yǎnjīng shì...de “ to make the sentence “我的眼睛是黑色的。 Wǒde yǎnjīng shì hēisè de. (My eyes are black.)”
body.incorrect: So close! Please think about what “色 sè” indicates.
